Package fr.univrouen.stb23v1.service

Interface IXMLService

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLService
public interface IXMLService
The XML service allows you to handle XML files, such as validation, transformation...

  • Method Details

    • isXMLValid

      void isXMLValid(String xml, File xsdFile) throws SAXException, IOException
      Validate the given XML string with the XSD at the given location.
      Parameters:
      xml - The XML string.
      xsdFile - The XSD schema file.
      Throws:
      SAXException - Exception thrown if the XML is invalid.
      IOException - Exception thrown by the underlying XMLReader.

    • getInstanceFromString

      <T> T getInstanceFromString(String xml, Class<T> objectClass)
      Convert the given XML string to an instance of the given object class. This method assume that the given xml string is valid.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object you want to instantiate.
      Parameters:
      xml - The XML string.
      objectClass - The object class.
      Returns:
      The instance of the given object, containing the XML data.

    • xmlToString

      <T> String xmlToString(T xmlObject, Class<T> objectClass) throws jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException
      Converts the given object to an XML String.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object you want to convert to String.
      Parameters:
      xmlObject - The JAXB compatible object.
      objectClass - The object class.
      Returns:
      The XML string.
      Throws:
      jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException - Exception thrown when the JAXB marshaller fails to convert to String.

    • transformXML

      String transformXML(String xml, File xsltFile) throws TransformerException
      Transform the given XML by using the given xsltFile.
      Parameters:
      xml - The XML string.
      xsltFile - The XSLT file.
      Returns:
      The String obtained by the transformation.
      Throws:
      TransformerException - Exception thrown when the xslt is invalid or if the object can't be transformed.
